altername_name: Nippon Daihyou Team no Kantoku ni Narou! Sekaihatsu Soccer RPG
Become the Coach of The National Team
Nihon Daihyou Team no Kantoku ni Naruu! Sekaihatsu Soccer RPG: Become the Coach for the National Team!
name: Nihon Daihyou Team no Kantoku ni Naruu! Sekaihatsu Soccer RPG
overview: Became the Japanese national soccer team coach, managing, training, trading, and doing everything a coach does and much more. Develop a strategy for your team and travel to other countries to discover hidden great players. For each stadium game, it features TV coverage and your team technical progress.
